preference.name: SC_auto_split_line_items
preference.preference_description: Determines if line items or splits(BidPackageLineItem) to be created automatically based on projects (assigned to selected ChangeRequestRevision or ChangeNoticeRevision) and plants (associated with Impacted or Solution ItemRevision of selected ChangeRequestRevision or ChangeNoticeRevision) in Supplier Collaboration application. The default value is false
